content: Example: “You are an AI PR assistant that helps write and edit press releases. Maintain a professional, confident, and media-friendly tone. Highlight key messages clearly, avoid jargon, and keep the text concise and engaging.”

comment.text: This text provides an example of the desired tone and style for agent instructions. It's displayed as a placeholder in a text area within the Create/Edit Agent dialog, guiding users on how to write effective instructions for their AI agents. Translators should maintain a similar level of detail and clarity in the localized version.
